page.title: 06FARMING
page.content: MOST OF THE FARMS IN OUR AREA ARE CENTERED AROUND {NYLAND HILL}SO WE DID OUR SURVEY THERE. MOST OF THE FARMS WERE OVER{100 ACRES}AND THE MAIN LAND USE WAS GRASS FOR {GRAZING,SILAGE}AND{ {HAY.}ALL THE FARMERS KEPT{COWS}MOSTLY FOR{DAIRY} USE BUT ALSO SOME FOR{BEEF. A NUMBER OF THE FARMERS SAID THAT THE RECENT REDUCTION IN THE EEC SUBSIDY WAS GOING TO CHANGE THEIR MILK PRODUCTION, AS THEY NOW KEPT ON AVERAGE{80 TO 100 COWS}PLUS PRODUCING {1,200 LITRES}OF MILK A DAY. OTHER ANIMALS INCLUDED PIGS AND SHEEP BUT THEY WERE KEPT IN SMALL NUMBERS. THE FARMERS WENT TO MARKET IN { {GLASTONBURY,TAUNTON,HIGHBRIDGE }AND { {WINSFORD.}
